Articles.Content: I am currently trying to get the interstellar tree to load on a new career, but tree loader will not offer any trees to choose from, just re-installed tree loader from a fresh download of interstellar, but it didn't fix anything. using the new version of interstellar if it matters (the official one, not interstellar lite)
Bump, exactly the same thing happening to me. Hopefully there's gonna be some kind of a hot-fix happening soon.
TreeLoader is hardcoded to check for trees at kspmodders.com, which is offline. r4m0n maintains that server and doesn't seem to be interested in fixing it.
so, how do I load interstellar, since I have a custom tree in my gamedata folder?

so, how do I load interstellar, since I have a custom tree in my gamedata folder?

This is easy enough to do. Create a new save, then exit the game. Now all you need to do is copy the tree.cfg file from the warpplugin folder under gamedata and paste that file in your save folder right next to the persistent.sfs.
